column4: sorry didn't want to interrupt -- I just went through installing java according to guides and now synaptic won't work and I keep getting an error "E: The package ibmjava2-142-ppc32-sdk needs to be reinstalled, but I can't find an archive for it."
do you have the ibmjava pkg on your hard disc somewhere?
yeah I've still got it -- it had me use the fakeroot alien to cnvert the rpm file
then open a terminal where the ibm pkg is and use dpkg to reinstall it
